basics.name: Yuhang Wu
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawai'i.  I expect to graduate in Spring 2027.

education.institution: University of Hawai'i at Mānoa, Honolulu, Hawaii, USA

work.company: International Structural Engineering and Construction Society
highlights: Respond to clients' questions and requests.
Verify the correctness of a very simple file system with computer checked proofs.

awards.title: State of Hawai'i B Plus Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to undergraduates who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public high school.

awards.title: Seal of Biliteracy
awards.awarder: The Hawai'i State Board of Education
awards.summary: An honor awarded upon graduation to students who demonstrate a high proficiency in both of the state's two official languages (English and Hawaiian) OR either of the state's two official languages and at least one additional language.  I received this honor by demonstrating a high proficiency in both English and Simplified Chinese.
